name: replace-variables-in-file
description: This task allows you to replaces the pipeline variables in a file with their corresponding values (not secrets) during a build or release process.
author: Andr√©s Lavado @ SETI S.A.S

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path and name of the file you want to replace.

inputs.name: contentToVariable
inputs.label: Store content in a variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Store the file content in a variable to use in another task.

inputs.name: variableName
inputs.label: Variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the variable name that will store the file content

inputs.name: endWithNewLine
inputs.label: End file with new line
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if you want to automatically add a new line at the end of the file.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if you want detailed logs.
